headline: Does Adobe’s AI Push and $20 Billion Buyback Change The Bull Case For Adobe (ADBE)?
summary: In December 2025, Adobe reported full-year 2025 results showing revenue of US$23.77 billion and net income of US$7.13 billion, while also issuing upbeat fiscal 2026 guidance and detailing a US$20.31 billion buyback that retired just over 10% of its shares. At the same time, Adobe deepened its push into generative AI by launching Photoshop, Express and Acrobat directly inside ChatGPT, potentially exposing its tools to hundreds of millions of new users and reinforcing its role in AI-enabled...
